Table of Contents

Class MainDirectoryService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Concrete
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Service handling private List<T> list of MainDirectory objects associated with existing directories, whose absolute paths they store and where .md files will be searched.

Inheritance: BaseService<T> -> BaseDirectoryService<T> -> MainDirectoryService
Implements: ICRUDService<T>, IDirectoryService<T>, IMainDirectoryService, IService<T> 

public sealed class MainDirectoryService : BaseDirectoryService<IMainDirectory>, IMainDirectoryService, IDirectoryService<IMainDirectory>, ICRUDService<IMainDirectory>, IService<IMainDirectory>

Constructors

MainDirectoryService()

Initializes a new instance of the MainDirectoryService class.

public MainDirectoryService()

Remarks

If there is directory with default path ( "pathToThisSolutionMainDirectory/../KursZostanProgramistaASPdotNET" ) on the disk, creates associated with it MainDirectory object on the stored list.

ReadByMergedFileId(int)

Gets, from the stored collection of objects, elements with the specified merged file identifier.

public List<IMainDirectory> ReadByMergedFileId(int mergedFileId)

Parameters

mergedFileId int

The searched merged file identifier.

Returns

List<IMainDirectory>

The list of objects with the specified merged file identifier. If there is no objects with equal mergedFileId, returned list is empty.
